metadata.title: OpenBench - EVMBench-Powered Smart Contract Security
metadata.description: Built on OpenAI & Paradigm's EVMBench standard. Detect honeypots, tax traps, and rug pull risks instantly.

hero.title: One-Click
hero.subtitle: Built on EVMBench, the smart contract security benchmark by OpenAI & Paradigm. Detect honeypots, hidden taxes, and rug pull risks instantly.

scanCategories.title: What Can You Scan?
scanCategories.subtitle: Supports all types of EVM smart contracts. Click any example to view a live report.

features.sectionSubtitle: Smart contract security analysis powered by OpenAI & Paradigm's EVMBench framework
features.scanDesc: EVMBench-validated honeypot detection. Instantly know if you can sell before you buy.
features.realtimeDesc: Detect hidden buy/sell taxes using EVMBench pattern matching. Avoid tokens that silently drain your funds.
features.multichainDesc: Scan tokens on Ethereum and BNB Chain with EVMBench-grade accuracy. More chains coming soon.
features.fixDesc: See top holders and whale concentration. Spot insider wallets and potential dump risks with on-chain intelligence.
features.complianceDesc: Verify if liquidity is locked. Unlocked LP means the dev can pull the rug anytime.
features.monitorDesc: Deep AI code analysis powered by the EVMBench framework. Detect 200+ vulnerability patterns in open-source contracts.

howItWorks.sectionSubtitle: Three simple steps to secure your investments
howItWorks.step1Desc: Paste the token's contract address and select the blockchain (ETH or BSC).
howItWorks.step2Desc: Our EVMBench-powered engine scans 15+ risk factors including honeypot, taxes, and contract permissions.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Get a clear, beginner-friendly safety report with a score and actionable risk checklist.

cta.title: Don't Get Rugged. Scan First.
cta.subtitle: EVMBench-powered security. Free to use. No sign-up required.

evmbench.feature1Desc: Comprehensive coverage of known EVM attack vectors
evmbench.feature2Desc: Benchmarked by the world's leading AI and crypto research labs
evmbench.feature3Desc: Continuous updates based on the latest exploit discoveries

audit.title: AI Smart Contract Audit
audit.subtitle: Paste your Solidity source code, upload a .sol file, or enter a contract address. Our AI engine analyzes 15 categories of vulnerabilities, access control issues, and gas optimizations.

capabilities.howDesc: Paste or upload your Solidity source code below. Our AI engine (powered by GPT-4o) analyzes it against the EVMBench vulnerability benchmark — covering 200+ known attack patterns. You'll receive a detailed security report with a score (0-100), vulnerability list, severity ratings, fix recommendations with code, and gas optimization suggestions.

workflow.step1Desc: Paste address, upload .sol file, or enter source code
workflow.step2Desc: GPT-4o scans 200+ vulnerability patterns via EVMBench
workflow.step3Desc: Detailed findings with severity, fix code, and gas tips

detect.flashLoanDesc: Flash loan attacks, front-running, sandwich attacks

capabilities.detectMore: + 9 more categories: integer overflow, unchecked calls, DoS, delegate call injection, timestamp dependence, randomness exploits, token standard violations, centralization risks, etc.

address.description: Enter a contract address or transaction hash. We'll automatically fetch the verified source code from Etherscan/BSCScan for AI analysis.
address.found: Found contract: {name} — Source code loaded. Click "Run Security Audit" to start analysis.
address.hint: Supports contract addresses (0x + 40 hex) and transaction hashes (0x + 64 hex). Only verified (open-source) contracts are supported.

whitepaper.metaDesc: OpenBench — EVMBench-powered smart contract security platform. Project overview, technology architecture, and OBT token economics.
whitepaper.title: OpenBench Whitepaper
whitepaper.subtitle: EVMBench-powered smart contract security platform. Protecting every trader from scam tokens and vulnerable contracts.

abstract.p1: OpenBench is a comprehensive smart contract security platform built on the EVMBench benchmark framework jointly developed by OpenAI and Paradigm. We provide one-click security scanning for EVM-based tokens, NFTs, and DeFi protocols, combining automated risk detection with AI-powered deep code auditing.
abstract.p2: Our mission is to democratize smart contract security — making professional-grade vulnerability detection accessible to every trader, investor, and developer in the Web3 ecosystem. With support for Ethereum and BNB Smart Chain, OpenBench covers the vast majority of on-chain assets where retail users face the greatest risks.

problem.p1: The Web3 ecosystem faces a crisis of trust. In 2024-2025 alone, billions of dollars were lost to scam tokens, rug pulls, and smart contract exploits. Retail traders are the most vulnerable — lacking the technical expertise to evaluate contract security before investing.
problem.scamDesc: Tokens designed so buyers cannot sell. Thousands deployed daily across EVM chains, targeting retail traders.
problem.taxDesc: Contracts with concealed buy/sell taxes that silently drain user funds with each transaction.
problem.rugDesc: Developers removing liquidity or exploiting admin functions to drain all funds from token holders.
problem.mevDesc: Sandwich attacks and front-running exploits that extract value from ordinary users' transactions.

solution.p1: OpenBench addresses these challenges through a multi-layered security approach, combining real-time risk scanning with deep AI code analysis:
solution.detectDesc: One-click scanning for honeypots, hidden taxes, rug pull indicators, and whale concentration risks.
solution.auditDesc: Deep code analysis based on the EVMBench 16-category vulnerability taxonomy with 200+ attack patterns.
solution.realtimeDesc: Live on-chain data from GoPlus Security API, Etherscan, and BSCScan for up-to-date risk assessment.
solution.multichainDesc: Full support for Ethereum and BNB Smart Chain, with more EVM chains planned.

modules.p1: OpenBench is organized into six specialized security modules, each targeting a specific category of Web3 risk:
modules.tokenDesc: Honeypot detection, tax analysis, holder distribution, liquidity lock verification, and comprehensive risk scoring for ERC-20 tokens.
modules.nftDesc: Security analysis for NFT contracts — detecting fake mints, metadata manipulation, rug pull mechanisms, and royalty exploits.
modules.nfaDesc: Non-Fungible Asset risk assessment — evaluating collection legitimacy, contract permissions, and market manipulation indicators.
modules.mevDesc: Identify MEV risks including sandwich attacks, front-running vulnerabilities, and arbitrage exploit vectors in DeFi interactions.
modules.flashLoanDesc: Detect flash loan attack vectors — oracle manipulation, governance attacks, liquidity pool exploits, and collateral ratio manipulation.
modules.auditDesc: Full EVMBench-standard code audit with GPT-4o and Claude. 16-category vulnerability scanning, SWC-aligned findings, and fix recommendations.

tech.p1: OpenBench integrates multiple security data sources and AI models into a unified analysis pipeline:
tech.evmbenchDesc: The core detection engine is built on EVMBench, the smart contract security benchmark by OpenAI × Paradigm. It covers 120 real-world vulnerabilities from 40 professional audits, organized into 16 categories aligned with the SWC Registry.
tech.aiDesc: Deep code analysis powered by OpenAI GPT-4o and Anthropic Claude. The AI engines systematically check all 16 vulnerability categories, providing severity ratings, SWC IDs, exact code locations, and concrete fix recommendations.
tech.goplusDesc: Real-time token risk data including honeypot detection, tax calculation, holder analysis, liquidity info, and contract permission checks across EVM chains.
tech.chainDesc: Fetches verified smart contract source code from Etherscan and BSCScan via the unified V2 API for AI code auditing.

token.p1: The OBT (OpenBench Token) is the native utility token of the OpenBench platform, deployed on BNB Smart Chain as a standard ERC-20 (BEP-20) token.
token.name: Token Name
token.auditPayDesc: Pay 100 OBT per AI smart contract audit. Tokens are transferred to the platform treasury upon audit submission.
token.apiAccessDesc: 1 OBT per API call for programmatic access to OpenBench scanning and audit services.
token.premiumDesc: Unlock advanced analysis features including batch scanning, custom reports, and priority processing.
token.governanceDesc: OBT holders will participate in platform governance decisions including fee adjustments and feature prioritization.

roadmap.q1Desc: Token Scanner (ETH + BSC), AI Code Audit (GPT-4o + Claude), EVMBench vulnerability taxonomy integration, token payment system, basic dashboard.
roadmap.q2Desc: NFT Scanner module, NFA Analysis module, OBT token deployment on BSC, API access program, multi-language support expansion.
roadmap.q3Desc: MEV Detection module, Flash Loan Analysis module, real-time monitoring alerts, additional EVM chain support (Polygon, Arbitrum, Base).
roadmap.q4Desc: Community governance framework, premium tier features, security score API for DeFi integrations, mobile app, strategic partnerships.

security.p1: OpenBench is committed to transparency and security. Our platform source code is fully open-source under the MIT license on GitHub. All scanning results are derived from publicly verifiable on-chain data and deterministic AI analysis.
security.p2: We do not collect personal information, store private keys, or require account registration for basic scanning. Wallet connections are used solely for token payment transactions. All API communications are encrypted via HTTPS.
